items.title: South Korea’s Edenlux set for U.S. debut of eye-strain wellness device
items.content_html: Edenlux builds wearable tech to protect and train your eyes, inspired by its founder’s personal vision recovery.
items.content_text: Edenlux builds wearable tech to protect and train your eyes, inspired by its founder’s personal vision recovery.

items.title: ‘Among the worst we’ve seen’: report slams xAI’s Grok over child safety failures
items.content_html: “We assess a lot of AI chatbots at Common Sense Media, and they all have risks, but Grok is among the worst we’ve seen,” Robbie Torney of Common Sense Media said.
items.content_text: “We assess a lot of AI chatbots at Common Sense Media, and they all have risks, but Grok is among the worst we’ve seen,” Robbie Torney of Common Sense Media said.

items.title: Northwood Space secures a $100M Series B and a $50M Space Force contract
items.content_html: This is the El Segundo, California-based startup's second raise in less than a year.
items.content_text: This is the El Segundo, California-based startup's second raise in less than a year.

items.title: Uber launches an ‘AV Labs’ division to gather driving data for robotaxi partners
items.content_html: Uber is not developing its own robotaxis again; instead it plans to collect and offer data. It's a bet that more volume will help autonomous vehicle partners solve the weirdest edge cases.
items.content_text: Uber is not developing its own robotaxis again; instead it plans to collect and offer data. It's a bet that more volume will help autonomous vehicle partners solve the weirdest edge cases.

items.title: Node-based design tool Flora raises $42M from Redpoint Ventures
items.content_html: Flora's node-based design tool is being used by companies like Pentagram and Lionsgate.
items.content_text: Flora's node-based design tool is being used by companies like Pentagram and Lionsgate.

items.title: China’s Moonshot releases a new open-source model Kimi K2.5 and a coding agent
items.content_html: The company said that the model was trained on 15 trillion mixed visual and text tokens.
items.content_text: The company said that the model was trained on 15 trillion mixed visual and text tokens.

items.title: Luminar receives a larger $33 million bid for its lidar business
items.content_html: A new leading bidder has appeared in the Luminar bankruptcy case: Redmond, Washington-based MicroVision, which beat out Quantum Computing Inc.'s bid by $5 million.
items.content_text: A new leading bidder has appeared in the Luminar bankruptcy case: Redmond, Washington-based MicroVision, which beat out Quantum Computing Inc.'s bid by $5 million.

items.title: Pinterest layoffs impact 15% of staff as resources redirected to AI
items.content_html: Pinterest says it's "reallocating resources to AI-focused roles and teams that drive AI adoption and execution" and "prioritizing AI‑powered products and capabilities."
items.content_text: Pinterest says it's "reallocating resources to AI-focused roles and teams that drive AI adoption and execution" and "prioritizing AI‑powered products and capabilities."

items.title: Airtable gets into the AI agent game with Superagent
items.content_html: SuperAgent is Airtable's first standalone product in its 13-year history, and signals both the company's ambitions and the reality of the current AI moment: every serious software player is racing to prove they can deliver on agents.
items.content_text: SuperAgent is Airtable's first standalone product in its 13-year history, and signals both the company's ambitions and the reality of the current AI moment: every serious software player is racing to prove they can deliver on agents.

items.title: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni’s Phia raises $35M to ‘make shopping fun again’
items.content_html: “We’re on the cusp of a completely new way of shopping,” Gates told TechCrunch.
items.content_text: “We’re on the cusp of a completely new way of shopping,” Gates told TechCrunch.

items.title: Samsung’s TriFold phone will cost $2,899 in the US
items.content_html: The phone's display unfolds twice to reveal a 10-inch display, which is the largest screen ever on a Galaxy phone.
items.content_text: The phone's display unfolds twice to reveal a 10-inch display, which is the largest screen ever on a Galaxy phone.

items.title: Risotto raises $10M seed to use AI to make ticketing systems easier to use
items.content_html: Designed to autonomously resolve help desk tickets, Risotto has raised $10 million in seed funding in a round led by Bonfire Ventures.
items.content_text: Designed to autonomously resolve help desk tickets, Risotto has raised $10 million in seed funding in a round led by Bonfire Ventures.

items.title: Amazon is closing its physical Amazon Go and Amazon Fresh stores
items.content_html: These retail closures will not impact customers who use Amazon for grocery delivery.
items.content_text: These retail closures will not impact customers who use Amazon for grocery delivery.

items.title: Indian states weigh Australia-style ban on social media for children
items.content_html: Any move to restrict children's access to social media in India would carry significant implications for global technology companies, for which the South Asian nation is a critical growth market.
items.content_text: Any move to restrict children's access to social media in India would carry significant implications for global technology companies, for which the South Asian nation is a critical growth market.

items.title: Android phones are getting more anti-theft features
items.content_html: Google says Android devices will get new security features, like stronger authentication safeguards and enhanced recovery tools.
items.content_text: Google says Android devices will get new security features, like stronger authentication safeguards and enhanced recovery tools.

items.title: Google now lets users jump from AI Overviews into AI Mode conversations
items.content_html: The tech giant also announced that it's making Gemini 3 the new default model for AI Overviews globally.
items.content_text: The tech giant also announced that it's making Gemini 3 the new default model for AI Overviews globally.

items.title: WhatsApp is rolling out a new stricter security setting to protect users from cyber attacts
items.content_html: Days after Meta was sued by over alleged false privacy claims by its chat app WhatsApp, the company has rolled out a new setting to protect users against cyber attacks. The feature, called Strict Account Settings, adds restrictions like automatically blocking media and attachments from unknown senders, and silencing calls from unknown numbers. Under this setting, link […]

The feature, called Strict Account Settings, adds restrictions like automatically blocking media and attachments from unknown senders, and silencing calls from unknown numbers. items.title: TikTok says it’s still working to recover its U.S. infrastructure
items.content_html: TikTok says some of the glitches continue but it's making "significant progress" in recovering its U.S. infrastructure.
items.content_text: TikTok says some of the glitches continue but it's making "significant progress" in recovering its U.S. infrastructure.

items.title: If you live in the UK, you probably won’t be able to visit Pornhub anymore
items.content_html: Pornhub parent company Aylo will restrict access from U.K. users, rather than comply with age verification mandates, which the company said it believes have not succeeded in promoting online safety.
items.content_text: Pornhub parent company Aylo will restrict access from U.K. users, rather than comply with age verification mandates, which the company said it believes have not succeeded in promoting online safety.

items.title: The price gap between Waymo and Uber is narrowing
items.content_html: Data collected and analyzed by Obi suggest a shift is underway.
items.content_text: Data collected and analyzed by Obi suggest a shift is underway.
